message.body: Deni kleuber sighting
Oh damn. Howd she look? I saw sophie Harris earlier
Yeah that's her norm. Where's she going next year? Bmcc?
LOL omg she's crazy. Deni looked kinda normal I guess, but just generally unattractive and trashy
Lololol I have no idea
New school. Thank you Facebook

Hey so I just talked to gabby about prom so basically we think that you and me should meet up and then go to gabby and jordan and we will all meet up near Chelsea piers take pix etc and then go to prom?
Uh that sounds good. We still have a lot of planning to do
Yeah I knoow! How/when should we do it?
Like ASAP I guess? Ughghghgh
Ok so what do we all need to figure out? Meeting up/getting ready/bags what else
How we are getting to the hamptons. I want to look into getting a limo
A limo to prom or to the hamptons. If we took a car to the hamptons instead of the lirr that would eliminate the weird waiting around part but would be $$$$
Yeah that works for me. Let's ask Jordan
But also we should find out how much it would be
Yeah exactly. I think just ft getting to the hamptons
Ok we kinda ditched the limo idea lololol
Nothing yet really. Bus is a better option I think. Pre prom at my house
And what did you come up with?
Like all of us? Ok. At which house?
And a bus in the morning or middle of the night
My moms, it's on riverside. Then we could walk or take a cab to Chelsea piers, much cheaper
If we were gonna have a limo drive us to the hamptons it would only take about half of us, everyone else will have to get there on their own
K. Works for me.
What will most likely happen is we will crash at my house or go out and party all night then pick up our stuff and head to the bus in the morning
Ok that works for me. That sounds good. And like easy.
Yeah. And this is for the 4 of us?
Yeahhh. Without a limo things are more flexible
Will and Julia? Joygill and Lisa?
But they're not coming to after prom so maybe my
Not
Probably more than that actually. I'm not sure exactly who yet
Yeah exactly
I'll finalize the guest list soon lolol
Ooh VIP
